verses.english: I swear by this city, Makkah -
verses.hausa: Bã sai Na yi rantsuwa da wannan gari ba.

verses.english: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
verses.hausa: Alhãli kai kanã mai sauka a cikin wannan gari.

verses.english: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
verses.hausa: Da mahaifi da abin da ya haifa.

verses.english: We have certainly created man into hardship.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mun halitta mutum cikin wahala.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.english: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
verses.hausa: Kõ yanã zaton bãbu wani mai iya sãmun iko, a kansa?

verses.english: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
verses.hausa: Yana cẽwa "Na halakarda dũkiya mai yawa,"

verses.english: Does he think that no one has seen him?
verses.hausa: Shin, yana zaton cewa wani bai gan shi ba?

verses.english: Have We not made for him two eyes?
verses.hausa: Shin, ba Mu sanya masa idãnu biyu ba?

verses.english: And a tongue and two lips?
verses.hausa: Da harshe, da leɓɓa biyu.

verses.english: And have shown him the two ways?
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu shiryar da shi ga hanyõyi biyu ba?

verses.english: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
verses.hausa: To, don mene ne bai shiga Aƙabã ba?

verses.english: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
verses.hausa: Kuma mene ne ya sanar da kai abin da ake cẽ wa Aƙabã?

verses.english: It is the freeing of a slave
verses.hausa: Ita ce fansar wuyan bãwa.

verses.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.english: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
verses.hausa: Ko kuwa ciyarwa, a cikin yini ma'abũcin yunwa.

verses.english: An orphan of near relationship
verses.hausa: Ga marãya ma'abũcin zumunta.

verses.english: Or a needy person in misery
verses.hausa: Ko kuwa wani matalauci ma'abũcin turɓãya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.english: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma ya kasance daga waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka yi wa jũna wasiyya da yin haƙuri, kuma suka yi wa jũna wasiyya da tausayi.

verses.english: Those are the companions of the right.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan ne ma'abũta albarka

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.english: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta da ãyõyinMu, sũ ne ma'abũta shu'umci

verses.english: Over them will be fire closed in.
verses.hausa: A kansu akwai wata wuta abar kullewa.
